panels.description:
Grafana tends to give fractional results when working out a value using the increase() function, and this is due to it using linear interpolation between samples inside the time range.

This interpolation gives you a more accurate average over arbitrary time windows — it’s especially important when you graph over long ranges or irregular scrape intervals.

So although you can’t have 0.1 of a request, that fractional value represents:

“an average rate that would yield roughly 26 requests in that time window.”

It’s mathematically smoothed, not physically fractional.
panels.title: Claims API Total Requests (Within range)

Fee Scheme Platform validation time quantiles

panels.description: This is the number of submissions which were created from the message queue.
panels.title: Total submissions created by event service

panels.description: This is the number of claims which were created from the submissions in the message queue.
panels.title: Total claims created by event service

panels.description: This is the number of claims which have been validated and has no issues
panels.title: Claims validated and has no warnings or errors

panels.description: This is the number of claims which have been validated, and warnings have been found (the claim is accepted, but might've been capped)
panels.title: Claims validated and has warnings

panels.description: This is the number of claims in which errors have been found with the submitted claim.
panels.title: Claims validated and has errors

panels.description: This is the number of submissions which were validated and the submission was valid.
panels.title: Total valid submissions

panels.description: This is the number of submissions which were validated and the submission was invalid. This could be due to either submissions level errors, or claim level errors.
panels.title: Total invalid submissions

panels.description: This is the number of submissions which were validated and errors were found with the submission itself (and not the claims within).
panels.title: Submissions validated and errors found with the submission
